text: I had a great time at this cozy spot! Itâ€™s the perfect place to relax and hang out with friends. The karaoke and pool table added to the fun atmosphere. The only downside is that they close at 11 PM, which was a bit early for us. Overall, a lovely place to unwind!
It's located near Bartley Residence condominium so we dropped by for a quick dinner after visiting. Self service cafe with local delights. Priced reasonably.

Very Nice Ambience & Facility like Playing Darts, Jackpot for seniors and Karaoke with Projector Screens and reasonable drinks that comes along free peanuts/snacks. Thete were Billard Tables to play. Very Spacious And big space for group gatherings there.

A Well Deserved Praise for this Vintage Building especially the Management Staffs is very Approachable and friendly that makes the atmosphere more attractive!
It is open to public and operating hours till 11.45am+. So head on down there as a group for old times Fellowship with old friends or camp mates/school mates. Worth it all. Cheers!
Pub at the first floor is a great place for chill drinks with friends! Has a pool table, karaoke and very reasonably priced drinks. Will definitely come back again!
Nice pub more for the senior citizen, food  is good. Staffs are friendly
